content: Thanks one and all for your thoughtful responses. A few of you criticized me for encouraging readers to “click the heart below.” Guess I’m still a recovering digital narcissist, but I should repeat a line from the article: “I’m not saying social media is evil, or that you shouldn’t try to make some money on-line. But don’t lose your soul in the process. Invest in yourself and hone your craft.” Here’s to all of us finding that sweet spot between total authenticity and reasonable self promotion!
